listitem.para:
Specifies a directory for administrator-controlled configuration files and directories. It may contain the following files and directories:
passwd
(optional) for IKEv1 XAUTH support if not using PAM (this file should not be world-readable). See README.XAUTH for more information.
nsspassword
(optional) passwords needed to unlock the NSS database in @@IPSEC_NSSDIR@@ (this file should not be world-readable). See README.nss for more information.
policies/
a directory containing policy group configuration information. See POLICY GROUP FILES in this document for more information.
When SELinux runs in enforced mode, changing this requires a similar change in the SELinux policy for the pluto daemon.
